tjc.model

Class Randomiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • tjc.model.Randomiser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTick, Power, World

    public abstract class Randomiser
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class to facilitate the generation of random numbers across classes whilst maintaining a single seed value Generates random integer values or floats from a normal distribution, making use of the Random library.

      • getNormal

        public float getNormal(float mean,
                       float sd)
        Overloaded method. Get a value from a normal distribution with no cutoff.
        Parameters:
        mean - The mean value of the distribution
        sd - The standard deviation of the distribution
        Returns:
        A value from the normal distribution.

      • getNormal

        public float getNormal(float mean)
        Overloaded method. Get a value from a normal distribution with no cutoff and an a standard deviation of 5% of the mean.
        Parameters:
        mean - The mean value of the distribution
        Returns:
        A value from the normal distribution.
